story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0200_10: Wait! Your goal is to destroy evil, isn’t it?!
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0300_10:
We’re not doing anything that would hurt
Pasio anymore!
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Y-yeah! Our bosses reevaluated our
organizational policies, and—
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
Leave your organization—and any loyalty and
ideals that go with it.
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0800_10: Or join us and be under my command.
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_0900_10:
Ugh! You think you can just do whatever
you want?!
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_1000_10: We’re not gonna betray our bosses!
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_1200_10: but to take you down here.
story_final_01_01000/2401_1201_1400_10: Quick, get out of here! Leave this to us!
